body_html:
Hi,
Great question! We have some work progressing on this (and I hope we can give an update in the near future on this).

Might I ask you to close this issue, and file it again in https://github.com/tensorflow/probability? We've been focusing / moving our code and efforts in to this repo (as you might notice the HMC code has moved there), and it would be good to keep the issue tracking there (and also since this is an important feature request).

Thanks!
Srinivas

body:
Hi,
  Great question! We have some work progressing on this (and I hope we can give an update in the near future on this).

Might I ask you to close this issue, and file it again in https://github.com/tensorflow/probability? We've been focusing / moving our code and efforts in to this repo (as you might notice the HMC code has moved there), and it would be good to keep the issue tracking there (and also since this is an important feature request). 

Thanks!
  Srinivas
